# Square Root of 2

> [Square root][sqrt] of `2`.

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var SQRT2 = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-two' );
```

#### SQRT2

[Square root][sqrt] of `2`.

``` javascript
SQRT2 === 1.4142135623730951;
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var SQRT2 = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-two' );

console.log( SQRT2 );
// => 1.4142135623730951
```

<!-- </examples> -->
